name: Pre-Roll Tins
seo_title: Custom Pre Roll Tin Boxes | RXDco
seo_description: Fully customizable tin box packaging for cannabis pre-rolls, pills and edibles. Customization options including shape, size, color, labelling and printing.
description: Fully customizable pre-roll tin packaging that are great for edibles too! Customization options include: shape, size, color, labeling and printing.
first_description: Our custom tin packaging is also great for protecting your product from damage. Our tins will keep your product fresh and safe from the elements, so you can be sure it will reach your customers in perfect condition. Order your custom tin box packaging today and give your product the professional look it deserves.
second_description: Sleek and secure, our tins are perfect for discreet storage or taking products on the road.
third_description: We offer fully customizable tin packaging for our customers. You can choose the size, shape, and design of your tin box packaging according to your specific needs and preferences. We also offer a wide range of finishing options for your tin box packaging, such as embossing, debossing, foil stamping, and UV coating. We will make sure that your tin box packaging is exactly what you want and need.
